abstract: The new service, in testing since last summer, is seen as a major step toward what Comcast calls “anytime, anywhere media.”
snippet: The new service, in testing since last summer, is seen as a major step toward what Comcast calls “anytime, anywhere media.”
lead_paragraph: Comcast, the nation’s largest cable operator, said Tuesday that its customers could now watch thousands of television episodes online that were previously unavailable. It said the new service, “Fancast Xfinity TV,” was a major step toward what it calls “anytime, anywhere media.”

headline.main: Comcast Introduces a Streaming TV Service
headline.print_headline: Comcast Introduces a Streaming TV Service
